cause.description:
jJohn was recently enrolled in a legal battle, the Ottawa Carelton Reginol Police abused there rights as Cops by Extorting my good friend help Me stop this persicution against John and keep him free.
1. Police brutality must stop
2. Cops should not be allowed to abuse there rights as authority figures
3. We must not allow them to extort our friend john
cause.mission: keep John lindsay out of the slammer
cause.name: stay free
